title: NYC COVID Update: Mayor Eric Adams ends vaccine mandates allowing unvaccinated athletes to play - WABC-TV
content:
1. NYC COVID Update: Mayor Eric Adams ends vaccine mandates allowing unvaccinated athletes to play  WABC-TV
  2. Stephen A. after NYC mayor lifted vaccine mandate: Kyrie is not a hero! | First Take  ESPN
  3. NYC’s Adams makes joke of COVID vaccine mandate by exempting athletes, performers (opinion)  SILive.com
  4. Kyrie Irving vs. John Doe: Mayor Adams’ pro athlete exception to the private employer vaccine mandate creates an unsustainable situation  New York Daily News
  5. Kyrie Irving allowed to play in home games after vaccine mandate was lifted | Get Up  ESPN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The city's vaccine mandate still applies to many, and critics of the decision blasted the mayor for seeming to lift the rule only for wealthy and famous athletes.
